item.description:
You are cordially invited to the 2nd annual Live Free or Die Celebration!

Issues:

*False-flag terrorism
*End Medical Marijuana Prohibition
*Mt Mondnock Zone Preservation
*Spychips and RFID tracking devices
*NH State Motto history and preservation
*National and REAL ID

Speakers:

George Corrette, Monadnock 9/11 Truth Alliance
Dr Katherine Albrecht, Author and radio host
Stuart Cooper, NH Marijuana Policy Initiative
Joel Winters, NH House Representative
Matt Simon, NH Common Sense
Jonathan Perri, Students For Sensible Drug Policy
Richard Olson Sr, Jaffrey Chapter CAACP

Music, vendors, and more!
item.name: 2nd Annual Live Free or Die Celebration
